text: It was all over and done with. For the time being Beryl was content to let it go at that, but she resolved to have it out with Piers when a reasonable opportunity presented itself. He must learn that he could not treat her with injustice and contempt, ignoring her explanations as though he were a schoolmaster and she a small, ignorant child.
handwritten_text: It was all over and done with. For the time being Beryl was content to let it go at that, but she resolved to have it out with Piers when a reasonable opportunity presented itself. He must learn that he could not treat her with injustice and contempt, ignoring her explanations as though he were a schoolmaster and she a small, ignorant child.
